title: X509Certificate2 support
body: There is lack of support for digitally signing X509 client certificates. Also there is no support for storing certificates in certificate store using .NET code and located in the device.

comments.body: I Agree!  Why has Microsoft not mentioned "Why" they did not implement this key security feature that will obviously allow customers to port over their security orientated applications.  Without this key ability, nothing Windows Phone related can be build for DoD or other government customers.
